      • initSession

        public RecapSession initSession(javax.jcr.Session localJcrSession,
                       RecapAddress address,
                       RecapOptions options)
                         throws RecapSessionException
        Description copied from interface: Recap
        Initialize a new RecapSession
        Specified by:
        initSession in interface Recap
        Parameters:
        localJcrSession - a local JCR Session (such as provided by ResourceResolver#adaptTo(Session.class) with appropriate write permissions for the paths that will be synced
        address - connection info for the remote repository
        options - sync options for the session
        Returns:
        a new RecapSession ready for sync
        Throws:
        RecapSessionException - if a connection can not be established to the remote repository
